attributes.action: Install a Tory rebel as Caretaker PM until the next General Election.
attributes.background: 21 Tory MPs were recently expelled from the party for voting against a No Deal Brexit. A number of them have said they will be leaving politics at the next election. This makes them ideal candidates for a caretaker Prime Minister, principled, independent and without political career ambitions.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for someone to be given a job.
